permissions.name: recommender.computeInstanceMachineTypeRecommendations.list
permissions.description: Only the permissions needed for the specific recommendations you're looking to produce are required. If using this policy only for idle recommendations, for example, `recommender.computeInstanceMachineTypeRecommendations.list` is not needed.
